alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Hodgeman; Pawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:57AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Hodgeman, Pawnee and northwestern Edwards Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rozel to near Gray. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rozel around 400 AM CDT. Sanford around 410 AM CDT. Ash Valley around 415 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Frizell and Larned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central, central and southwestern Kansas.
